```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


## `pivot_longer`

load pulse data

```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

wide format to long format
```{r}
pulse_data_tidy = 
  pulse_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m, 
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bid",
    
  )

```

rewrite , combine and exten (to add a mutate)
```{r}
pulpulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m, 
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bid",
    ) %>% 
  relocate(id, visit) %>% 
  mutate (visit = recode (visit, "bl" = "00m"))
```
